data.current_description: Article Search requests use the following URI structure:
data.summary_suggestion: Search New York Times articles by query
data.description_suggestion: Search the New York Times article archive from September 18, 1851 to present. Returns matching articles with headlines, abstracts, lead paragraphs, multimedia links, and metadata. Supports filtering by date range, news desk, section, and other criteria. Results are paginated and ranked by relevance or date. Requires API key authentication.
